title: Universe: the infinite frontier: an introductory astronomy telecourse
description: This series examines the history and science of astronomy. It includes superb graphics, photographs and time-lapse footage from satellites and observatories, and leading scientists in the various fields of astronomy offer clear explanations and valuable information.
